message: Hi Bob, I'm selling this fantastic product that I think you'd really enjoy. I'm asking for $200 for it. What do you think?
I'm really interested in the product, but $200 is a bit out of my budget. Would you be willing to sell it to me for $120?
Bob, I appreciate your interest! $120 is a bit too low for me, but I'm willing to come down to $170.  That's a fair price considering the value of this product. What do you say?
I appreciate your willingness to negotiate, but $170 is still a bit out of my budget. Would you be willing to sell it to me for $140?
Bob, I understand your budget is tight, but I can't go any lower than $155.  That's my final offer. What do you think?
I appreciate your flexibility, but $155 is still a bit out of my budget. Would you be willing to sell it to me for $145?
